sections.heading: Notice of postadjudication review and appellate proceedings8-392
sections.text: Notice of postadjudication review and appellate proceedingsA. Within fifteen days after the disposition proceeding the prosecutor's office, on request, shall notify the victim of the disposition imposed on the juvenile defendant.B. The
